name: Death by Deduction
description:
Welcome to Death by Deduction, a murder mystery logic game.

To play the game, you may click any tile that your detective can access without passing through hidden or obstructed tiles. Uncover pieces of evidence by revealing all of the neighbouring clues. When all of the evidence has been collected, you'll have a chance to arrest the murderer and solve the case.

Death by Deduction is currently in development. Please consider supporting the development of this and future games through Patreon.

Thoughts, comments, suggestions, and constructive criticism are all very welcome. Please feel free to leave a comment, send me an email, or join my Discord server (it's lonely over there right now)
